entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 1:04PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water on the Bighorn River with Flooding Possible... The Bighorn River at St. Xavier was running at 15,700 cfs this afternoon which is likely resulting in some low land flooding in spots along the river as well as significant bank erosion. Over the next 36 hours heavy precipitation is expected along the river, with 1.5 to 2 inches likely and locally heavier accumulations possible.
